name: Simple Tactical Game
description:
Controls:

  • Arrows to move around
  • X to select a unit or confirm UI
  • V to cancel
  • U to end turn quickly
  • If you have moved a unit but haven't attacked yet, you can hover over it and press V to cancel the movement
  • Double press V on a tile with no units to show the options menu

Game Rules:

  • Each side has a certain amount of a resource called "AP"
  • Each unit has a certain AP cost
  • you are free to move as many units as you wish as long as your AP allows it, and the unit is able to
  • Destroy all enemy units to win!

Other Notes:

This is a prototype of a menu-based tactical rpg (think disgaea). The purpose of the project is to serve an educational purpose in improving my skills with unreal. Despite being aware of a few bugs and the fact that it can really use a better coat of paint (especially in the UI department), I'm not considering any updates for this project for the time being as it has already served its purpose. Thus, it may never be revisited.
